eligibility.notes: 7-11 COD; opened ~18h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: SNAD
snadResult.reason: The seller listed a ‘bright indoor photo’ for the hoodie color, but the delivered hoodie color is significantly darker than the photos. This constitutes a misleading image, as the image doesn’t accurately represent the product’s true color.

primaryOption.label: Return & Full Refund
primaryOption.details: Seller reimburses NT$60 COD shipping and provides a return label.

alternativeOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
alternativeOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-15011
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The seller listed a ‘bright indoor photo’ for the hoodie color, but the delivered hoodie color is significantly darker than the photos. This constitutes a misleading image, as the image doesn’t accurately represent the product’s true color.
Decision: SNAD
Outcome: The dispute was resolved with the AI system determining the buyer’s request for a refund.
